name: Quizivo! Beta
description:
Welcome to Quizivo!

Quizivo makes learning more fun with tons of game modes.

Game modes

CLASSIC

The original Quizivo that gives you a quiz. This mode has 10 questions.

FACTORY

How to play: Answer 3 questions to add a worker to your factory. Your worker can produce apples, bananas, and even bread. Your goal is to get $2000.

GOLD RUSH

How to play: Answer a question to get 3 random chests that each contain a reward. Your goal is to get 1500 gold. The rewards are listed here.

List Of Rewards
